alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suwannee County through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Dowling Park, or 13 miles south of Madison, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dowling Park, Mcalpin, Luraville and Newburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
